<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://validationnamespace.raml.org" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://validationnamespace.raml.org">
    <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="names">
        <simpleType>
            <restriction base="string"/>
        </simpleType>
    </element>
</schema>

<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://validationnamespace.raml.org" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://validationnamespace.raml.org">
    <element name="controls">
        <complexType>
            <sequence>
                <element minOccurs="0" name="url">
                    <simpleType>
                        <restriction base="string"/>
                    </simpleType>
                </element>
                <element name="property">
                    <simpleType>
                        <restriction base="string"/>
                    </simpleType>
                </element>
                <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="names">
                    <simpleType>
                        <restriction base="string"/>
                    </simpleType>
                </element>
                <any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" processContents="skip"/>
            </sequence>
        </complexType>
    </element>
</schema>

description.value:
Used to send a valid OAuth 2 access token. Do not use
with the "access_token" query string parameter.

Used to send a valid OAuth 2 access token. Do not use with
the "Authorization" header.

Bad or expired token. This can happen if the user or Dropbox
revoked or expired an access token. To fix, re-authenticate
the user.

Bad OAuth request (wrong consumer key, bad nonce, expired
timestamp...). Unfortunately, re-authenticating the user won't help here.
oauth 2.0

            </restriction>
        </simpleType>
    </element>
</schema>

body.toXmlSchema:
<schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://validationnamespace.raml.org" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://validationnamespace.raml.org">
    <element name="User">
        <complexType>
            <sequence>
                <element name="firstname">
                    <simpleType>
                        <restriction base="string"/>
                    </simpleType>
                </element>
                <element name="lastname">
                    <simpleType>
                        <restriction base="string"/>
                    </simpleType>
                </element>
                <element name="age">
                    <simpleType>
                        <restriction base="integer">
                            <minInclusive value="0"/>
                            <maxInclusive value="144"/>
                        </restriction>
                    </simpleType>
                </element>
                <element minOccurs="0" name="height">
                    <simpleType>
                        <restriction base="double"/>
                    </simpleType>
                </element>
                <element minOccurs="0" name="goggles" type="boolean"/>
                <any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" processContents="skip"/>
            </sequence>
        </complexType>
    </element>
</schema>

</xsd:schema>
